text: Have there been any developments in mixing HubL and PostCSS?
<https://devbeej.com/|BJ Szyjakowski> created an excellent <https://github.com/spingroup/postcss-hubl|HubL + PostCSS compatibility plugin>! I’ve used it in a few projects and haven’t seen any issues.
Whoops, just saw that you posted about this in <#CQ8KX8WRZ|gratitude> — hadn’t peeked in that channel before replying here. :sweat_smile:
